targets.rawSql:
SELECT  --DISTINCT ON (a.codigo) a.codigo::Text "CODIGO CASO", 
    		    a.nombre::Text "CODIGO CASO",
    		    e.cedula::Text "CEDULA", e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
    			  e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO", b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO", d.nombre::Text "PARROQ",
    			--  z.latitud::decimal "LATITUD",
	  	      --z.longitud::decimal "LONGITUD",
	  	      a.direccion::Text "DIRECCION", a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
    			  f.name::Text "CATEGORIA", g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
            case when n.name is null then 'Sin Categ Adi' else n.name end::Text "CATEG ADI",
    			  i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
    			  to_char(a.fecha,'dd-mm-YY hh:mm:ss') as "FECHA",
    			  to_char(h.fecha_registro,'dd-mm-YY hh:mm:ss') as "FECHA ESTATUS",
            case when k.nombre is null then 'Analizando' else k.nombre end::Text "INSTITUCION",
            --case when v.name is null then 'Analizando' else (v.name || ' ' || v.last_name ) end::Text "RESPONSABLE",
    			  --v.phone::Text "TELF. RESP",
    			  a.verificado as "Verificado",
    			  a.feedback as "Valoracion",
    			  a.titulo as "Asunto"
        FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.historico h ON h.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON h.id_estatus = i.id     
           -- inner join gestion.ubicacion z on z.id_caso = a.id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = h.id_caso and j.principal is true
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            --LEFT JOIN  public.user_detail v ON w.id = v.user_id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category n ON n.id = a.id_adicional_categoria
            where i.nombre in ($estatus) --h.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8)  
            --and h.active = 1 
            and b.nombre in ($estado) 
            and g.name in ($sub_categoria) 
            --and k.nombre in ($institucion)
            order by a.nombre desc;

targets.rawSql:
SELECT DISTINCT ON (a.nombre) a.nombre::Text "CODIGO CASO",  
    		    --a.codigo::Text "CODIGO CASO",
    		    e.cedula::Text "CEDULA", e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",e.edad::TEXT "EDAD",e.genero::TEXT "SEXO",
    			  e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO", b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO", d.nombre::Text "PARROQ", a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
    			  f.name::Text "CATEGORIA", g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
            case when n.name is null then 'Sin Categ Adi' else n.name end::Text "CATEG ADI",
    			  i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
    			  to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YY')::Text "FECHA",
            case when k.nombre is null then 'Analizando' else k.nombre end::Text "INSTITUCION",
            --case when v.name is null then 'Analizando' else (v.name || ' ' || v.last_name ) end::Text "RESPONSABLE",
    			  --v.phone::Text "TELF. RESP",
    			  a.verificado as "Verificado",
    			  a.feedback as "Valoracion",
    			  a.titulo as "Asunto"
    		    FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.historico h ON h.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON h.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = h.id_caso --a.id and j.id_user is not null
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            --LEFT JOIN  public.user_detail v ON w.id = v.user_id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category n ON n.id = a.id_adicional_categoria
            where h.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) /*and h.active = 1*/ order by a.nombre desc;

select count(a.id) as TOTAL
                from gestion.caso a
                   inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
                    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
                where a.id_sub_categoria in (10) and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) --and d.active = 1

select count(*) as TOTAL
                from gestion.caso a
                inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_extra_categoria
                inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
            where c.id/*id_sub_categoria*/ in (10)
                and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
                --and d.active = 1

select count(*) as TOTAL
                from gestion.caso a
                    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
                    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
                where c.id in (10) and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) /*and d.active = 1*/ and a.id_extra_categoria is null

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
                inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
                inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
                LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria   
            where c.id in (10)
               and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) --and d.active = 1
            GROUP BY sub_categoria
            ORDER BY total desc;

select count(a.id) as TOTAL
                from gestion.caso a
                   inner join gestion.category/*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
                    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
                where a.id_sub_categoria in (13) and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) --and d.active = 1

select count(*) as TOTAL
                from gestion.caso a
                inner join gestion.category/*extra_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_extra_categoria
                inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
            where c.id/*id_sub_categoria*/ in (13)
                and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
                --and d.active = 1

select count(*) as TOTAL
                from gestion.caso a
                    inner join gestion.category/*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
                    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
                where c.id in (13) and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) /*and d.active = 1*/ and a.id_extra_categoria is null

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
                inner join gestion.category/*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
                inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
                LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria   
            where c.id in (13)
               and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) --and d.active = 1

select count(a.id) as TOTAL
                from gestion.caso a

                    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
                where a.id_sub_categoria in (12) and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) --and d.active = 1

select count(*) as TOTAL

select count(*) as TOTAL

                    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
                where c.id in (12) and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) /*and d.active = 1*/ and a.id_extra_categoria is null

SELECT case when m.name is null then c.name else m.name end as sub_categoria, COUNT(a.id) as total 
	         FROM gestion.caso a 
                inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
                inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category/*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (10,12,13) and 
    --d.active = 1  and 
    d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category/*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (10)

    and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8,9)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category/*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category /*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria

-- Casos Cerrados
 select 
          ec.tx_nom_edo_caso::Text estatus,
          d.tx_nom_sub_categoria::Text servicio,
          count(c.id_caso)::Text subtotal,
          (select count(*) from caso where id_edo_caso in (7))::Text Total
        from 
            caso c 
            inner join edo_caso ec on c.id_edo_caso = ec.id_edo_caso 
            inner join public.caso_sub_categoria d on d.id_caso_sub_categoria = c.id_caso_subcateg
        where 
            ec.id_edo_caso in (7)
            GROUP BY ec.tx_nom_edo_caso, servicio;

select 
	(SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.category/*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
		inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
		where a.id_sub_categoria in (10,13)
		--and d.active = 1
		and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)) 
	+
	(SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.category/*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
		inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
		inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
		inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
		where a.id_sub_categoria in (12) 
		/*and d.active = 1*/ and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) 
	 	and k.id in (361,369)) as total

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category/*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (10,12,13)
    --and d.active = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (1,2)

SELECT 
	(SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
	  inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	  inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
      where b.id_resolutorio in (select id from gestion.resolutorio r where id_categoria = 10) --(478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
	  and a.id_sub_categoria in (10)/* and d.active = 1*/ and d.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8))
		+
		(SELECT count(a.id)
	    FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.category/*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
		inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
		where a.id_sub_categoria in (13) /*and d.active = 1*/ and d.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8))
		+
		(SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.category/*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
		inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
		inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
		inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
		where a.id_sub_categoria in (12) /*and d.active = 1*/ and d.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8) and k.id in (361,369))/*(553,561))*/as total

SELECT 
	(SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
	  inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	  inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
      where b.id_resolutorio in (select id from gestion.resolutorio r where id_categoria = 10)--(478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
	  and a.id_sub_categoria in (10) /*and d.active = 1*/ and d.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8))
		+
		(SELECT count(a.id)
	    FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.category/*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
		inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
		where a.id_sub_categoria in (13) /*and d.active = 1*/ and d.id_estatus in (6))
		+
		(SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
		inner join gestion.category/*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
		inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
		inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
		inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
		where a.id_sub_categoria in (12) /*and d.active = 1*/ and d.id_estatus in (6) and k.id in (361,369)) /*(553,561))*/ as total

SELECT trunc(COUNT(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (SELECT COUNT(*) 
                                           FROM gestion.caso a 
                                           INNER JOIN gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
                                           WHERE a.id_sub_categoria in (10,12,13)
                                           --AND d.active = 1
                                           AND d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8))::decimal,2) as porcetaje
FROM gestion.caso a
INNER JOIN gestion.category/*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
INNER JOIN gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
WHERE a.id_sub_categoria in (10,12,13)
--AND d.active = 1 
AND d.id_estatus in (6);

SELECT (
	 (SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	where b.id_resolutorio in (select id from gestion.resolutorio r where id_categoria = 10)--(478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
	  and a.id_sub_categoria in (10) /*and d.active = 1*/ and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8))
	 +
      (SELECT count(a.id)
            FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.category/*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
            where a.id_sub_categoria in (13) /*and d.active = 1*/ and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8))
    +
    (SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.category /*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
            inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = d.id_caso  --a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
            where a.id_sub_categoria in (12) /*and d.active = 1*/ and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) and k.id in (361,369)/*(553,561)*/)
         ) as total
    FROM gestion.caso 
    group by total

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id 
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = d.id_caso
	where b.id_resolutorio in (select id from gestion.resolutorio r where id_categoria = 10)--(478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
	  and a.id_sub_categoria in (10)
    --and d.active = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
	  inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	  inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where b.id_resolutorio in (select id from gestion.resolutorio r where id_categoria = 10)--(478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
	  and a.id_sub_categoria in (10)
    --and d.active = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
	  inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	  inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where b.id_resolutorio in (select id from gestion.resolutorio r where id_categoria = 10)--(478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598) 
	  and a.id_sub_categoria in (10)
    --and d.active = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (6)

SELECT trunc(count(a.id)::decimal * 100 / (SELECT count(a.id)
											FROM gestion.caso a
											inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
											inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
											where a.id_sub_categoria in (1) and d.active = 1 and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)
									 		and b.id_resolutorio in (select id from gestion.resolutorio r where id_categoria = 10)/*(478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)*/)::decimal, 2) as porcentaje
	FROM gestion.caso a
	inner join gestion.responsable b on b.id_caso = a.id
	inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
	where a.id_sub_categoria in (1)
	and b.id_resolutorio in (select id from gestion.resolutorio r where id_categoria = 10)--(478,579,580,581,582,583,584,585,586,587,588,589,590,591,592,593,594,595,596,598)
	--and d.active = 1 
	and d.id_estatus in (6);

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category/*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (13)
    --and d.active = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category/*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (13)
   -- and d.active = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (3,4,7,8)

SELECT count(a.id)
	  FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (13)
   -- and d.active = 1
    and d.id_estatus in (6)

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category/*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
    inner JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id
    inner JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio
    where a.id_sub_categoria in (12) --and d.active = 1 
    and d.id_estatus in (3,4,6,7,8) and k.id in (553)

SELECT count(a.id)
	FROM gestion.caso a
    inner join gestion.category/*sub_categoria*/ c on c.id = a.id_sub_categoria
    inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id

SELECT DISTINCT ON (a.nombre) a.nombre::Text "CODIGO CASO", 
            --a.codigo::Text "CODIGO CASO", 
            e.cedula::Text "CEDULA", e.nombre::TEXT "DENUNCIANTE",
          	e.telefono::Text "TELEFONO", b.nombre::Text "ESTADO", c.nombre::Text "MUNICIPIO", d.nombre::Text "PARROQ", a.descripcion::TEXT "DESCRIP", 
          	f.name::Text "CATEGORIA", g.name::Text "SUBCATEG",case when m.name is null then 'Sin ExtCateg' else m.name end::Text "EXTCATEG", 
            case when n.name is null then 'Sin Categ Adi' else n.name end::Text "CATEG ADI",
			      i.nombre::Text "ESTATUS",
		      	to_char(a.fecha, 'dd-mm-YY')::Text "FECHA",
            case when k.nombre is null then 'Analizando' else k.nombre end::Text "INSTITUCION"
            --case when v.name is null then 'Analizando' else (v.name || ' ' || v.last_name ) end::Text "RESPONSABLE",
			--v.phone::Text "TELF. RESP"
            FROM gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.municipio c on c.id = a.id_municipio
            inner join gestion.parroquia d on d.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.denunciante e on e.id = a.id_denunciante
			      inner join lista.ubch z on z.cedula = e.cedula
            inner join gestion.category f on f.id = a.id_categoria
            inner join gestion.category g on g.id = a.id_sub_categoria
            inner JOIN  gestion.historico h ON h.id_caso = a.id
            inner JOIN  gestion.estatus i ON h.id_estatus = i.id            
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.responsable j ON j.id_caso = a.id and j.id_user is not null
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.resolutorio k ON k.id = j.id_resolutorio 
            LEFT JOIN  public.user w ON w.id = j.id_user
            --LEFT JOIN  public.user_detail v ON w.id = v.user_id
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category m ON m.id = a.id_extra_categoria
            LEFT JOIN  gestion.category n ON n.id = a.id_adicional_categoria
            where h.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8) /*and h.active = 1 */order by a.nombre desc;

panels.title: REPORTE DE CASOS RESUELTOS DE OTROS MUNICIPIOS (CIUDADES IMPORTANTES)

targets.rawSql:
select (c.nombre || ' (' || b.nombre || ')')::Text "PARROQUIAS", 
            count(a.id) as TOTAL
            from gestion.caso a
            inner join gestion.estado b on b.id = a.id_estado
            inner join gestion.parroquia c on c.id = a.id_parroquia
            inner join gestion.historico d on d.id_caso = a.id  
     where a.id_sub_categoria in (10,12,13) /*and d.active = 1*/ and d.id_estatus in (1,2,3,4,6,7,8)
       group by c.nombre, b.nombre
        order by TOTAL desc limit 50

 order by c.id asc
